Steam (ST): The cousins walked along the beach, playing in all kinds of ways.
Umineko Project (UP): The cousins walked along the water's edge, playing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The cousins walked along the beach, playing.
PC Japanese (JP): いとこたちは、波打ち際を散歩しながら、色々と遊んだ。
Russian (RU): Кузены шли вдоль пляжа, играя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os primos caminharam juntos pela costa, se divertindo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 堂兄妹們在沙灘散步的時候，玩了許多遊戲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 堂兄妹们在沙滩散步的时候，玩了许多游戏。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I cugini camminavano lungo la spiaggia, giocando.

Steam (ST): They searched for bits of glass, polished by the waves to become small and gem-like. They caught up on news of each other's lives and joked around.
Umineko Project (UP): They searched for bits of glass, polished by the waves to become small and gem‐like.{n}They caught up on news of each other's lives and joked around.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They searched for bits of glass, polished by the waves to become small and gem-like. They caught up on news of each other's lives and joked around.
PC Japanese (JP): 波で研磨された、宝石のようなガラス石を探したり。それぞれの近況を語り合ったり、茶化したり。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 波で研磨された、宝石のようなガラス石を探したり。{n}それぞれの近況を語り合ったり、茶化したり。
Russian (RU): Они искали стекляшки, отшлифованные волнами и ставшие маленькими жемчужинами.{n}Делились новостями из жизни и шутили.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles procuravam por pequenos pedaços de vidro, polidos pelas ondas até diminuírem de tamanho e ficarem semelhantes a pequenas gemas.{n}Conversando sobre as vidas de cada um enquanto brincavam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 像尋找被海浪研磨過的，寶石一般的玻璃石。{n}聊著彼此的近況，互相開玩笑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 像寻找被海浪研磨过的，宝石一般的玻璃石。{n}聊着彼此的近况，互相开玩笑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cercavano frammenti di vetro, levigati dalle onde e divenuti piccoli e simili a gemme. Si misero al corrente delle vite di ognuno e scherzavano.

Steam (ST): They wrote words in the sand. They chased the receding waves and ran away from the coming ones.
Umineko Project (UP): They wrote words in the sand.{n}They chased the receding waves and ran away from the coming ones.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They wrote words in the sand. They chased the receding waves and ran away from the coming ones.
PC Japanese (JP): 砂に文字を書いてみたり。返す波を追ってみたり、寄せる波から逃げてみたり。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 砂に文字を書いてみたり。{n}返す波を追ってみたり、寄せる波から逃げてみたり。
Russian (RU): Писали слова на песке.{n}Гнались за отступающими волнами и убегали от наступающих.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Escreveram palavras na areia.{n}Corriam atrás das ondas que recuavam e fugiam das que voltavam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 還有在沙灘上寫字。{n}追著海浪玩耍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 还有在沙滩上写字。{n}追着海浪玩耍。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Scrivevano parole sulla sabbia. Inseguivano le onde che si ritiravano e scappavano da quelle che ritornavano.

Steam (ST): The cousins enjoyed the time they had to themselves.
Umineko Project (UP): The cousins enjoyed this time they had to themselves.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The cousins enjoyed this time they had to themselves.
PC Japanese (JP): いとこだけの、楽しい時間が過ぎていった。
Russian (RU): Кузены весело проводили время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os primos aproveitaram o tempo deles juntos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 度過了一段只屬於堂兄妹的，愉快的時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 度过了一段只属于堂兄妹的，愉快的时间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I cugini si godevano questo momento che avevano solo per loro.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): If they waited around, they might have to deal with scattered raindrops as well.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se demorassem muito, eles teriam que lidar com algumas gotas de chuva também.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 再呆下去的话，肯定不久，连雨滴都会落下来呢。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "I guess it'll be raining the whole time from now on. What a pain."
Umineko Project (UP): "And I guess it'll be raining the whole time from now on. What a drag."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「これで、あとはずーっと大雨ってわけか。何だかゲンナリするぜ。」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Acho que vai ficar chovendo o tempo todo agora. Que saco."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「看起来，过会儿会有场大雨啊。真让人不爽嘞。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E credo che d'ora in poi pioverà tutto il tempo. Che palle."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "Still, even though it didn't last long, it was fun to be a kid again."
Umineko Project (UP): "Still, even though it didn't last long, it was fun to be a kid again for a while."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「でも、短い時間だったけど、童心に戻れて楽しかったよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも、短い時間だったけど、童心に戻れて楽しかったよ」
Russian (RU): "Но было весело снова побыть ребёнком, пусть даже недолго."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Apesar disso, embora não tenha durado muito, foi divertido voltar a ser criança por um momento."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，雖然時間不長，找回童心還是挺快樂的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，虽然时间不长，找回童心还是挺快乐的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Però, anche se non è durato a lungo, è stato divertente essere nuovamente dei bambini per un po'."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "I can't wait to show Mama this glass gem! I'm gonna tell her I won!"
Umineko Project (UP): "I can't wait to show Mama this glass gem! I'm gonna tell her I won!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「このガラス石、早くママに見せてあげるの！　真里亞が優勝したってママに教えるの！」
Russian (RU): "Не терпится показать маме эту стекляшку! Я скажу ей, что победила!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mal posso esperar para mostrar esta gema à mamãe! Vou contar que a Maria venceu!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「真想早點給媽媽看這些玻璃石！告訴媽媽是真里亞獲勝了！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「真想早点给妈妈看这些玻璃石！告诉妈妈是真里亚获胜了！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non vedo l'ora di mostrare a Mamma questa gemma di vetro! {n}Le dirò che ho vinto!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Ihihi. Even though you only won 'cause I gave you mine."
Umineko Project (UP): "Ihihi. Even though you only won 'cause I gave you mine."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「いっひっひ。俺が見つけたヤツを譲ったんだけどなー。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「いっひっひ。俺が見つけたヤツを譲ったんだけどなー」
Russian (RU): "Ихи‐хи. Хотя ты победила только потому, что я отдал тебе свою."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ihihi. Mesmo que só tenha vencido porque eu te dei as minhas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嘻嘻嘻。不過是靠我把自己找到的讓給你才贏的——。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嘻嘻嘻。不过是靠我把自己找到的让给你才赢的——。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ihihi. Anche se hai vinto solo perché ti ho dato la mia."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Uu-! I got it, so it's mine! So I won! Uu-uu-uu-!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu! I got it, so it's mine! So I won! Uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-! I got it, so it's mine! So I won! Uu-uu-uu-!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うー！　真里亞がもらったから、真里亞のものなの！　だから真里亞が優勝なの！　うーうーうー！！」
Russian (RU): "У‐у! Она у меня, а значит, моя! Поэтому я победила! У‐у, у‐у, у‐у!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu! Se a Maria ganhou, então é da Maria! Por isso, a Maria venceu! Uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚——！真里亞拿到了，就已經是真里亞的東西了！所以是真里亞獲勝！嗚——嗚——嗚——！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——！真里亚拿到了，就已经是真里亚的东西了！所以是真里亚获胜！呜——呜——呜——！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Uu-! Ce l'ho io, quindi è mia! Perciò ho vinto! Uu-uu-uu-!!"

Steam (ST): Ange walked distractedly, pulled along by her brother.
Umineko Project (UP): Ange walked distractedly, pulled along by her brother.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ange caminhou distraída, puxada pelo seu irmão.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ange camminava in modo distratto, strattonata da suo Fratello.

Steam (ST): George and the others thought that she had probably woken up too early and was tired, so they didn't try to talk to her much.
Umineko Project (UP): George and the others thought that she had probably woken up too early and was tired, so they didn't try to talk to her much.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George and the others thought that she had probably woken up too early and was tired, so they didn't try to talk to her much.

Russian (RU): Джордж и остальные посчитали, что она слишком рано проснулась и устала, поэтому особо с ней не разговаривали.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): George e os demais deviam ter acordado muito cedo hoje e já estavam cansados, por isso não tentaram falar muito com ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治他們覺得，一定是因為早上起得太早，現在困了，所以沒有找她說話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治他们觉得，一定是因为早上起得太早，现在困了，所以没有找她说话。

Steam (ST): As they reached the end of the forested path, the rose garden lay before them. They could see strong winds making the rose bushes wave.
Umineko Project (UP): As they reached the end of the forested path, the rose garden lay before them.{n}They could see the strong winds making the rose bushes wave.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As they reached the end of the forested path, the rose garden lay before them. They could see the strong winds making the rose bushes wave.
PC Japanese (JP): 林道を抜け、薔薇庭園の景色が広がる。強い風に、薔薇の茂みがうねるのが見えた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 林道を抜け、薔薇庭園の景色が広がる。{n}強い風に、薔薇の茂みがうねるのが見えた。
Russian (RU): Как только они дошли до конца лесной дорожки, перед ними раскинулся розарий.{n}Они видели, как сильный ветер раскачивает кусты роз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando chegaram ao fim da trilha pela mata, o jardim de rosas se estendeu diante deles. Eles podiam ver os fortes ventos fazendo os arbustos de rosas se agitarem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 穿過林間小道，玫瑰庭園的景色出現在眼前。{n}強烈的風，把玫瑰叢都給吹出了波浪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 穿过林间小道，玫瑰庭园的景色出现在眼前。{n}强烈的风，把玫瑰丛都给吹出了波浪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una volta raggiunta la fine del percorso boschivo, il giardino di rose si estese davanti a loro. Potevano vedere i forti venti che facevano ondeggiare i cespugli di rose.

Umineko Project (UP): "Mama!! Look!! I won!!"

Umineko Project (UP): "I'm gonna head back to my room for a sec. I'll meet you in the cousins' room right after."

Umineko Project (UP): However, when he saw Ange standing still with a crabby look on her face, he realized that she might have been put into a bad mood by something.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, when he saw Ange standing still with a crabby look on her face, he realized that she might have been put into a bad mood by something.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、縁寿が気難しそうな顔をして、立ち尽くしているのに気付き、何か事情があって機嫌を悪くしているのかもしれないと察する。
Russian (RU): Но увидев, как Энджи стоит на месте по‐прежнему с раздражительным взглядом, он понял, что ей что‐то могло испортить настроение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, ao ver que Ange estava com uma cara entristecida, ele percebeu que alguma coisa poderia ter deixado ela mal‐humorada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，他察覺到緣壽的表情有些不愉快，呆呆地站著，像是有什麼事情令她心情不好了似的。

Umineko Project (UP): The only ones left in the rose garden were Battler, who was waving at George, ......and Ange, who was still staring at the ground and holding Battler's hand.

PC Japanese (JP): 薔薇庭園には、譲治に手を振る戦人と、……その戦人と手を繋ぎながら、ずっと俯いている縁寿が残った。
Russian (RU): В розарии остались только Баттлер, машущий Джорджу...... и Энджи, которая всё смотрела в землю, держа Баттлера за руку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os únicos que restaram no jardim de rosas foram Battler, que estava acenando para George, ......e Ange, que continuava a encarar o chão enquanto segurava na mão de Battler.

Steam (ST): For the past few minutes, he had repeatedly asked Ange what was wrong.
Umineko Project (UP): For the past few minutes, he had repeatedly asked Ange what was wrong.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For the past few minutes, he had repeatedly asked Ange what was wrong.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por alguns minutos, ele perguntou várias vezes o que estava incomodando Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “怎麼了，緣壽？”……戰人從剛才起，就一直在問。
Chinese Simplified (CN): “怎么了，缘寿？”……战人从刚才起，就一直在问。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per qualche minuto, aveva ripetutamente chiesto a Ange che cosa avesse.

Steam (ST): He realized that this wasn't anything like a stomachache, or something obvious that had made her grumpy.
Umineko Project (UP): He realized that this wasn't anything like a stomachache, or something obvious that had put her into a bad mood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He realized that this wasn't anything like a stomachache, or something obvious that had put her into a bad mood.
PC Japanese (JP): お腹が痛いとか、明白な理由があって不機嫌であるとか、……そういうのでないことはわかっている。
Russian (RU): Он понял, что ей испортила настроение уж точно не боль в животе или нечто очевидное.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele percebeu que não era nada como uma dor estomacal ou algo muito óbvio que teria deixado ela emburrada.

Steam (ST): However, young girls sometimes get upset for reasons that only they can understand.
Umineko Project (UP): However, young girls sometimes get upset for reasons that only they can understand.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, young girls sometimes get upset for reasons that only they can understand.

Steam (ST): "It's true that Ushiromiya Kinzo was a rigid man. When he was younger, he really was strict with his kids, apparently. ...And, well, it's probably not wrong to say that it was pretty traumatic for Dad and the others, and that they're still a bit scared of him."

PC Japanese (JP): 「右代宮金蔵は、確かに厳しい人だったさ。若かった時は、相当、キツく息子たちに当たっていたらしい。……それが半ばトラウマになって、クソ親父たちが未だ、祖父さまのことをおっかながっていることは、……まぁ、確かにハズレじゃない。」

Podemos dizer que eles ainda têm um pouco de medo dele, ......e, bem, você não estaria errada em dizer isso."

Steam (ST): The grand tale of how Kinzo restored the Ushiromiya family was more than enough to paint him as a rigid, terrifying man.
Umineko Project (UP): The grand tale of how Kinzo had restored the Ushiromiya family was more than enough to paint him as a rigid, terrifying man.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Russian (RU): Громкой истории о том, как Кинзо возродил семью Уширомия, было более чем достаточно, чтобы изобразить его суровым, страшным человеком.

Steam (ST): That was the scary witch who would snatch you up and carry you off into the forest if you didn't listen to your parents or stayed up too late on Rokkenjiima.
Umineko Project (UP): That was the scary witch who would snatch you away off into the forest...if you didn't listen to your parents or stayed up too late on Rokkenjiima.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That was the scary witch who would snatch you away off into the forest if you didn't listen to your parents or stayed up too late on Rokkenjiima.
PC Japanese (JP): 六軒島でお泊りの時、親の言うことを聞かなかったり、いつまでも夜更かししていたりすると、森にさらっていってしまう、恐ろしい魔女のことだ。

Chinese Simplified (CN): 在六轩岛过夜时，要是不听父母的话，或者熬夜太久的话，就会被她拐到森林里去，是个可怕的魔女。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era la spaventosa strega che ti avrebbe preso e portato nella foresta se non avessi ascoltato i tuoi genitori o se fossi rimasto sveglio fino a tardi su Rokkenjima.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange

Umineko Project (UP): "On rainy nights, ......if you look out the window at the dark forest, ......you might see the witch looking back at you and get snatched away...... That's what Mom told me."

Russian (RU): "Мама сказала, что... если в дождливую ночь выглянуть из окна в тёмный лес, ......можно встретиться взглядом с ведьмой и пропасть."

Steam (ST): "No, it's no problem. Anyone would say that upon meeting a witch. Normally, I would ignore provocation from such a small child, but she is your little sister, after all. Why don't we give her a special showing?"
Umineko Project (UP): "No, it's no problem. Anyone would say that upon meeting a witch. Normally, I would ignore provocation from such a small child, but she is your little sister, after all. Why don't we give her a special showing?"

PC Japanese (JP): 「よいよい。魔女に会えば、誰だって同じことを問うだろう。いつもならば、このような幼子の挑発に付き合いはせぬのだが、戦人の妹であるからな。特別に披露してやってもよい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「よいよい。魔女に会えば、誰だって同じことを問うだろう。いつもならば、このような幼子の挑発に付き合いはせぬのだが、戦人の妹であるからな。特別に披露してやってもよい」
Russian (RU): "Нет, ничего. Любой бы сказал такое при встрече с ведьмой. Обычно я бы проигнорировала провокацию ребёнка, но она всё‐таки твоя младшая сестра. Сделаем для неё исключение."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não, não tem problema. Qualquer um diria isso se encontrasse uma bruxa. Normalmente, eu ignoro provocações de crianças, mas ela é a sua irmã. Acho que devemos fazer um show só pra ela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「沒事沒事。第一次見到魔女，任何人都會問同樣的問題。如果是平時，妾身是不會答理這種小孩的挑釁的。但既然汝是戰人的妹妹，那妾身就專門展現一次吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「没事没事。第一次见到魔女，任何人都会问同样的问题。如果是平时，妾身是不会答理这种小孩的挑衅的。但既然汝是战人的妹妹，那妾身就专门展现一次吧。」

Umineko Project (UP): She gulped, then stared up at the witch's face.

Steam (ST): The witch held out her left hand, bringing it close to Ange's face. Then, she slowly spread her fingers.
Umineko Project (UP): The witch held out her left hand, bringing it close to Ange's face.{n}Then, she slowly spread her fingers.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch held out her left hand, bringing it close to Ange's face. Then, she slowly spread her fingers.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 魔女は、そっと左手を差し出し、縁寿の顔に近づけた。{n}そしてゆっくりと手の平を開いてみせた。

Umineko Project (UP): Ange, thinking that she was about to be turned into a frog, shrank back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Ange, thinking that she was about to be turned into a frog, shrank back.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim que Ange olhou para cima para ver o dedo erguido, ela balançou para baixo, como se estivesse tentando desviar o olhar dela.

Steam (ST): In that manner, ...up, down, left, right, then left again. As though Ange was playing a game of {c:86EF9C:Acchi Muite Hoi}.
Umineko Project (UP): In that manner, ...the finger swung up, down, left, right, then left again, as though Ange was playing a game of {c:86EF9C:Acchi Muite Hoi}.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that manner, ...up, down, left, right, then left again. Ange, feeling as though she'd lose if she couldn't keep up with the fingertip,
PC Japanese (JP): そんな調子で、上、下、左、右、また左と、まるであっち向いてホイでもされてるような感じになる。
Russian (RU): И точно так же... вверх, вниз, влево, вправо, потом снова влево, будто Энджи играла в "{c:86EF9C:атти муитэ хой}".
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dessa maneira, ...o dedo balançou para cima, baixo, esquerda, direita, esquerda novamente, como se Ange estivesse brincando de {c:86EF9C:Acchi Muite Hoi}.

Steam (ST): Ange, feeling as though she'd lose if she couldn't keep up with the fingertip, swung her face this way and that, looking serious.

Russian (RU): Энджи, чувствуя, что проиграет, если не уследит за кончиком пальца, с серьёзным видом вертела головой и так и этак.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sentindo como se fosse perder caso não conseguisse acompanhar a ponta do dedo, Ange balançou sua cabeça para cada direção, aparentando estar séria.

Steam (ST): Ever since she was very young, Ange had hated to lose. She would take even the most trivial games seriously, determined not to lose to the adults.
Umineko Project (UP): Ever since she was very young, Ange had always hated to lose. She would take even the most trivial games seriously, determined not to lose to the adults.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since she was very young, Ange had always hated to lose. She would take even the most trivial games seriously, determined not to lose to the adults.

Russian (RU): Энджи была очень юна и ненавидела проигрывать. Она воспринимала всерьёз даже самые мелкие игры, полная решимости не проиграть взрослым.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然缘寿还小，但要赢的欲望很强。因为不想输给大人，不论多无聊的游戏都会很认真地对待。

Umineko Project (UP): The witch's hand moved faster and faster. Ange didn't lose track of it.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A mão da bruxa foi se movendo cada vez mais rápido. Ange não a perdeu de vista.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哥哥和魔女，真的關係很好。{n}意氣相投得好像說相聲的搭檔一樣，向前走去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哥哥和魔女，真的关系很好。{n}意气相投得好像说相声的搭档一样，向前走去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Fratello maggiore e la strega sembravano davvero intimi. Con uno spirito affine, come una coppia di comici, iniziarono a camminare.

Steam (ST): Ange held onto the corner of her brother's sleeve, trying to make sure he didn't forget about her...
Umineko Project (UP): All the while, Ange held onto the corner of her brother's sleeve, trying to make sure he didn't forget about her...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Ange held onto the corner of her brother's sleeve, trying to make sure he didn't forget about her...
PC Japanese (JP): 縁寿は、自分のことを兄に忘れられないように、兄の服の裾をずっと握っているのだった…。
Russian (RU): Энджи взялась за кончик рукава своего брата, чтобы он не забыл о ней...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Durante todo o percurso, Ange segurou a ponta da manga de seu irmão, tentando garantir que ele não iria esquecer dela...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 緣壽為了不讓哥哥忘了自己還在，抓住了哥哥衣服的下襬…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 缘寿为了不让哥哥忘了自己还在，抓住了哥哥衣服的下摆…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ange afferrò l'angolo della manica di suo Fratello, cercando di assicurarsi che non si dimenticasse di lei...
